benchmark_details.name: StickerQueries (Multilingual Sticker Semantic Understanding Dataset)
benchmark_details.overview: StickerQueries is a multilingual dataset comprising 1,115 English and 615 Chinese sticker search queries, annotated using a gamified framework, Sticktionary, to enhance query generation and sticker retrieval accuracy.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a rich dataset for understanding sticker queries and enhancing sticker retrieval applications through contextually appropriate multilingual annotations.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: The dataset primarily includes contributions from a young adult demographic and is relatively small in size.

data.source: Contributors annotated sticker queries using the gamified Sticktionary framework.
data.annotation: Annotated by over 60 contributors through gamified interaction.

methodology.calculation: Metrics were calculated based on performance in query generation and retrieval tasks.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores in automated evaluation metrics indicate better model adaptation and understanding of sticker contexts.
methodology.validation: Validated through comprehensive quantitative and qualitative evaluations.

targeted_risks.demographic_analysis: The dataset primarily reflects the usage behavior of a younger demographic.
